query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `promotion_codes` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `code` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `usedCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `lastUsedAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `promotion_codes_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `promotion_codes_code_unique` UNIQUE(`code`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49rQA9eTW5K3aEQ.root --database bwb5QLDJGEKZppJnjPFZwE --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `promotion_codes` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `code` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `usedCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `lastUsedAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `promotion_codes_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `promotion_codes_code_unique` UNIQUE(`code`)
);
